Detailed Description

Contains all the variables in a CSP instance.

Member Function Documentation

vector<Var> ProbSpec::VarContainer::buildVarList ( const string &  name,
const vector< int > &  params 
) [inline]

Given a matrix variable and a parameter list, returns a slice of the matrix. Params can either be wildcards (denoted -999), or a value for the matrix.
